1.title: Albondigas
1.plot: Alba demonstrates how she cooks her mom's original Cuban recipe of Albondigas. Cuban style meatballs.

2.title: Ropa Vieja (Old Clothes)
2.plot: Alba demonstrates how to cook Ropa Vieja, an original Cuban recipe from her ninety-year-old mom. You will not find this recipe in any traditional cookbook.

3.title: Arroz Con Pollo (Rice with Chicken
3.plot: Alba demonstrates another original Cuban recipe, that is a favorite with her three sons and all her friends.

imdb.plot outline: Cuban-born Alba Yates shares eighty-year-old original Cuban recipes that she learned from her ninety-year-old mom. Alba came to the United States at age six. She worked for over twenty-five years as an L.A. County Deputy Sheriff. After retiring from the Sheriff's Department, her passion became cooking original Cuban Recipes she learned from her ninety-year-old mom. Alba now shares them with you.
imdb.title: Alba's Cuban Kitchen
plot: Cuban-born Alba Yates shares eighty-year-old original Cuban recipes that she learned from her ninety-year-old mom. Alba came to the United States at age six. She worked for over twenty-five years as an L.A. County Deputy Sheriff. After retiring from the Sheriff's Department, her passion became cooking original Cuban Recipes she learned from her ninety-year-old mom. Alba now shares them with you.
